RegexFunctionsPerPage.description: How many functions are allowed in a single page? Keep this at least above 3 for usability.

RegexFunctionsAllowModifiers.description: Should we allow modifiers in the functions, e.g. the /i modifier for case-insensitive?

RegexFunctionsAllowOptions.description: Should we allow internal options to be set (e.g. (?opts) or (?opts:some regex))?

RegexFunctionsLimit.description: Limit for rsplit and rreplace functions. -1 is unlimited.

RegexFunctionsDisable.description: Array of functions to disable, a.k.a these functions cannot be used. :)
